fields.description: Claude API key for document processing. Get your API key from https://console.anthropic.com/
fields.label: Anthropic API Key

fields.description: Enable fast processing mode for quicker document analysis
fields.label: Fast Mode

fields.description: Maximum number of pages to process per document (1-10)
fields.label: Max Pages

fields.description: Processing confidence threshold (0.1-1.0). Lower values extract more fields but may include less accurate data
fields.label: Confidence Threshold

fields.description: Enable detailed logging for processing operations
fields.label: Enable Logging

fields.description: Maximum time in seconds for processing jobs (60-600)
fields.label: Timeout (seconds)

fields.description: Queue type for background processing: short (< 5 min), default (< 30 min), long (> 30 min)
fields.label: Queue Type
